dict.string: Voice search requires access to your microphone to transcribe your spoken search terms. All audio is processed locally and never stored or transmitted.
Voice search uses speech recognition to convert your spoken words into search text. All processing happens locally on your device for maximum privacy.
Search notes in your Apple Contacts to find people you've saved there. Your contacts remain private and are never stored or transmitted.
Set birthday reminders in your Calendar to never miss important dates.
